title: Student Mobile

definition.title: HTTP Status Classes - All Student Mobile

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:trace.rack.request.hits.by_http_status{env:production AND resource_name:next::student::mobile* AND (http.status_class:4xx OR http.status_class:5xx)} by {http.status_code}.as_count()

definition.title: HTTP Status Errors - All Student Mobile

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:trace.rack.request.hits.by_http_status{env:production AND resource_name:next::student::mobile* AND (http.status_class:4xx OR http.status_class:5xx)} by {http.status_code,resource_name}.as_count()

definition.title: HTTP Status Classes - All Student Mobile

HTTP Status Errors (5xx) - All Student Mobile
HTTP Status and Duration on Sign-In

definition.content:
Tracks performance alongside requests in order to:

1. See if performance scales non-linearly
2. Spot unusual spikes in sign-ins

(`401`s should ≈ `200`s as unauthorized users sign in.)
We once shipped a bug that caused users of the production app to try to sign in to our staging environment. A spike here, particularly with a non-`200` status, might indicate we did it again.

definition.title: circle ci beta release avg build time
Misc Code Coverage (files w/ no naming convention)
HTTP Status and Duration on Conversation List

definition.content: Tracks performance alongside requests in order to help isolate unexpected latency spikes. We know the conversation list can be an expensive API, and have done server-side and client-side work to mitigate this.

definition.title: App Rollout w/ Release Overlay (Sign In)
